Name: Honey Bubble
Ingredients: 12.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Top up with Fiol Extra Dry Prosecco
Instructions: STIR honey syrup with gin in glass until honey dissolves. Top with prosecco.
Review: Light and delicate, a tasty aperitif cocktail.
History: Adapted from a cocktail promoted in 2013 by Bols, the Dutch liqueur producer, to promote their honey liqueur which can be used in place of honey syrup.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Bubble contains 98 calories
Garnish: Mint sprig in top of hulled strawberry
